Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Thank goodness Haicma made it back in time! No way I could have saved all these people otherwise...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's just a shame we lost some supplies while we were at it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "If Sage hadn't made the quick decision to switch frames, the Red Tide would have flooded this area by the time Trailblazer and I made it back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'And... those humans over there.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She turns to look at the humans huddled in the corner who are trembling in fear.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1101.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'They were residents of the nearby conservation area before the Red Tide flooded it. Chased by the red sludge, they fled to the nearby ruins.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "—Humans shouldn't be here! These people should have died instead!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'We should have thrown them into that red sludge when we could!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "If it weren't for these humans, we could have saved more of our own kind! If we had just ignored these people and gone straight to save ours...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Among the quietly huddled crowd, a little girl bursts into tears, terrified by the imposing mechanoid before her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hooded Girl', 3: "There, there... It's okay...", 4: '2'}
{3: "The hooded girl, clearly too young to be the child's mother, holds the little girl tightly in her arms."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: '—Trailblazer, stop it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma stares at Trailblazer who just lashed out at the humans with a serious look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's okay, little one...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Nanami kneels down and gently pats the little girl's head."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey... Check this out!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She opens her palm to reveal a tiny speck of light hidden within.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '3', 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '4', 4: '4'}
{3: 'The speck of light expands, forming two tiny stars that dance through the air.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 4: '4'}
{3: "Distracted, the little girl sniffles and carefully watches the stars in Nanami's hand."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Alright, this one's for you—", 4: '2'}
{3: "The tiny star transforms into a hair clip and finds its place in the little girl's hair."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And this one! Is! For! You! Lazer!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiChopping03.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '4'}
{3: 'The now obviously-enlarged "tiny star" bonks heavily against Lazer\'s head as Nanami makes her declaration.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiFuenSnowGame/FxUiFuenSnowGameXingxingBaodian.prefab', 4: '4'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "There we go! Lazer! Mechanoids and humans should get along! Don't you bully humans!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: '...Hmph!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trailblazer flares up again, having spun a few rounds.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "It's all because of that weirdo in the red sludge! I could have brought our people back! But there was nothing I could do when the red sludge got the two of them!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Come out! Fight me to the death! You freak!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Star', 3: "D-did you just say you saw some weirdo in the Red Tide? That's scary...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aya', 3: 'Urrrghh! Uuuurrrrggghhh!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Church of Machina erupts into chaos and is now awash in wailing and cursing.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Sage, are you... really sure about this?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She does not know if humans and mechanoids can truly coexist in peace.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's gonna be okay...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey! Let go of that human!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In an instant, some conflict breaks out, and another mechanoid lifts up a screaming human high into the air—'}
{3: 'The coexistence between humans and mechanoids is not as simple as she previously imagined.'}
{3: 'In this short period alone, friction between mechanoids and humans has resulted in 15.5 incidents, with that extra 0.5 being...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Phew, good thing I made it here before they started fighting...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'If this goes on... are things really going to be okay? The Church of Machina has never taken in humans before.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Um... Things should work out eventually, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami gets along great with the commandant! Commandant never gets angry at Nanami! Everything's gonna be fine!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Anyway, let's leave them be for the time being!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Nanami hums an unfamiliar tune as she walks toward Zavier's magic workshop."}
